overview_of_class: The winter section of ME 398 is only for students who chose to work on a two-quarter project in the previous fall section. The winter section is an optional continuation of the fall ME 398 and cannot be taken independently. It can count as a Tech Elective.
name: Engineering Design II - Senior Capstone, Quarter 2
title: MEAS MECH_ENG 398-2-1 Engineering Design II - Senior Capstone, Quarter 2
